titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8450

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, July 22nd 1862.

Hon:
Nat Gaither Jr
Sec of State-
Sir

I report as follows: W. T. McClure Capt: has resigned died.
James B. Foreman 1 Lieut: is promoted.
Ahemaaz H. Chambers 2 Lieut: is promoted. (date of Coms: 13th Novr 1861)_
Aaron Blakeman Capt: has died_
John J Goodnight 1 Lieut: is promoted
Henry L Whitehouse 2 Lieut: is promoted (date of Coms: 12th Novr 1861_)
Richd C. Dawkins 1 Lieut: is promoted (date of Com: 22 Decr 1861)

I send for record eleven Commissions viz:
(Over)
Capt: Richd C. Dawkins- date 19 June 1862- 1
1 Lieut: Joseph H. Dawkins- date 1 July 1862 -- 2
2 Lieut: John L. Lee- date 20 June 1862 -- 3.
Capt: John J. Goodnight- date 16 July 1862- 4.
1 Lieut: Henry L. Whitehouse -- " -- " -- " -- " -- 5.
2 Lieut: Abraham Whitenack -- " -- " -- " -- " -- 6.
" -- Jabez Truett -- " 4 July " -- 7.
" -- James A. Watson -- " " -- " -- " -- 8.
Capt -- James B. Forman -- " 13 -- " -- " -- 9.
1 Lieut -- Ahemanz H. Chambers " -- " -- " -- " -- 10.
2 Lieut -- Joseph L. McClure- -- -- -- -- 11.
Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
